entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.7°C

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -20.9°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Local blowing snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
